Reviews.Title: “Spacious!”

Reviews.Content: spacious close orchard rd bus taxi walk guess amenities bare minimum hey youre shopping day comfy clean bed clean shower hot water blockout blinds sleep 9 highly recommend hotel bargain near orchard rd

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: LeonieLordHoweIsland
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 nights christmas family gathering found hotel adequate clean rainshower usual 15 min easy walk beginning orchard ave shop site drinks snacks essentials purchase cheap asian style buffet breakfast available purchase didnt utilise comment reception staff slow communicating phone fixed 2 floors constant lift usage free wifi bonus contacting friends family festive season especially location price recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel, Great Location with large rooms!”

Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location ten minute walk orchard road huge free wired internet staff friendly welcoming able answer questions huge extremely clean looked double beds shower rain shower bathroom kept clean free internet hotel rare singapore definitely recommend stay
